title: Can you nerf Annie already?
body:
She has a 2s cd farm ability, a stun every 4 seconds if combo'd right + insane point and click damage.

I'd rather verse 5 pre-nerf Kassadins than an Annie.

replies.body: Yeah get good mate she's nowhere near what she once was

> [{quoted}](name=WEETBIX 4 BREKKI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OV6eVcf7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-22T01:38:35.774+0000)
>
> Yeah get good mate she's nowhere near what she once was

Riot gutted all assassins, so she may not as good in general as she was, but she's still a threat as theirs no one left that can take her out without getting chunked for 80% of their HP.

> Riot gutted all assassins



Sure, tell that to Katarina and Talon.
Orianna / Syndra can easily out poke her then all in her

> [{quoted}](name=WEETBIX 4 BREKKI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OV6eVcf7,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-22T03:22:53.546+0000)
>
> Orianna / Syndra can easily out poke her then all in her

They're mages, not assassins.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OV6eVcf7,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-22T04:05:53.212+0000)
>
> They're mages, not assassins.

you said she's op, they both destroy her
Noobs getting bashed by a little girl

Annie most definitely needs a nerf/rework . The biggest issue is that nobody ( that ive seen for years now ) plays her as she was originally designed , as an AP carry. She is exclusively picked as a support champ. Supports arent supposed to have that level of burst AND easily spamable stun. Its basically a guaranteed kill in lane if she lands her stun , as her burst will be enough to set you up for an easy finish for her ADC. Change her skills , or drop her ratios into the dirt. Or just change her passive so she can only stun with tibbers? There isnt really any other champ capable of doing what she is doing atm.

They nerfed Tibbers damage on PBE already. Just gotta wait for next patch.

Change from 350 at all ranks to 200/300/400

I think change Q to a skillshot and people won't be so salty about her.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OV6eVcf7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-22T03:07:10.759+0000)
>
> They nerfed Tibbers damage on PBE already. Just gotta wait for next patch.
> 
> Change from 350 at all ranks to 200/300/400
> 
> I think change Q to a skillshot and people won't be so salty about her.

THAT's a BUFF, WTF

so losing 150 damage at level 6 is a buff? LOL its a shift in her power so she can't just immediately blow you up at 6. I'm pretty sure an Annie with a Blasting Wand at level 6 can 100-0 almost anyone. Now she won't be able to.

Its also a BIG nerf to Support Annie who doesn't get the gold to take advantage of the AP scaling so base nerfs will hurt her.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OV6eVcf7,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-03-22T03:24:39.416+0000)
>
> so losing 150 damage at level 6 is a buff? LOL its a shift in her power so she can't just immediately blow you up at 6. I'm pretty sure an Annie with a Blasting Wand at level 6 can 100-0 almost anyone. Now she won't be able to.
> 
> Its also a BIG nerf to Support Annie who doesn't get the gold to take advantage of the AP scaling so base nerfs will hurt her.

The issue isn't her lategame, well it is because of her fucked free Q and free stuns, and no mana issues.. her lategame damage is insane for how simple her kit is, sure, now melee champions will have a slight easier time against Annie, but she is still going to fuck everyone up lategame with her bullshit stuns and damage.
Ah yes, I forgot champions who typically buy a ROA early or Morello/Athene have no mana issues.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OV6eVcf7,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-22T04:34:42.437+0000)
>
> Ah yes, I forgot champions who typically buy a ROA early or Morello/Athene have no mana issues.

FFS! She has no mana issues because of her Q being free if it last hits.

Annie's just as much of a fkhead as Udyr...

Annie, because she has low range (it's not even that low) and only 3 offensive abilities so Riot made all of them have really good damage scalings but what they don't realise is that Annie's abilities are hard as hell to miss. Most of the high damage AP abilities have some form of 'counterplay' to them, something like Nidalee's spears have a travel time and is a skillshot etc. ALL OF ANNIE'S SHT IS EITHER AOE OR POINT&CLICK MAN.

The only other champion I know well with this damage type is Kassadin...and he's all the way to the ground...

Annie is pretty strong atm :P
I think that new item will be good on her for engaging and the aoe it provides with her other aoe spells...
